reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made with a true off-the-shoulder style that fits beautifully, particularly noting how it falls off the shoulders perfectly.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for date night
items.body: The Zenlonr Women’s Off-The-Shoulder Sweater is a must-have for anyone looking to add a chic and versatile piece to their wardrobe. This sweater combines effortless elegance with comfort, making it an excellent choice for date nights or any occasion when you want to feel stylish yet cozy. The off-the-shoulder design adds a flirty and feminine touch, while the batwing sleeves create a relaxed and flowy silhouette that flatters a variety of body types. The knit material is soft and lightweight, striking the perfect balance between warmth and breathability. It drapes beautifully and doesn’t cling, making it both comfortable and sophisticated. This sweater pairs effortlessly with jeans, leggings, or even a sleek skirt, allowing you to dress it up or down depending on the occasion. The quality of the fabric and stitching is impressive, with no loose threads or pilling after multiple wears and washes. I’ve received numerous compliments on how stylish it looks, especially when accessorized with a statement necklace or a pair of bold earrings. What truly stands out about this sweater is how versatile it is. Whether you’re going out for a romantic dinner, grabbing drinks with friends, or just lounging at home, this sweater fits the bill perfectly. The timeless design and flattering fit make it a staple piece that I keep reaching for again and again. If you’re looking for a sweater that’s comfortable, stylish, and perfect for date night, the Zenlonr Off-The-Shoulder Sweater is a fantastic choice! Read more
items.author: Kb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic
items.body: Awesome sweater! Perfect fit, good thickness, color spot on. I’m 5’9 at 120lbs, got a small, tried it on, went and immediately ordered it in another color! Love it, looks so chic and it was a great price! Read more
items.author: Wildflower

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly excellent quality!
items.body: This sweater is excellent quality! It is soft and incredibly comfortable. The fit is as expected. It is a heavier weight sweater. That will definitely keep you warm! Read more
items.author: Ryan O.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stylish
items.body: love this sweater! it is super cute , easily dressed up or down. can wear off one shoulder or both. material is thick and well made, true to size and very cozy. great for fall days Read more
items.author: Jami

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the softest sweaters
items.body: Very soft- collar has a soft binding as well. The ribbing of the knit is angled- right shoulder to left hip direction- which is a nice detail. Very fitted sleeves up to about the elbow then the open bat-wing. Also more fitted at hem, so it sits nicely on the hips without riding up or falling down. Currently wearing over a long sleeve- was looking for more just open neck and not necessarily off the shoulder- which I think it fits both. It feels like I could be a little too warm over the long sleeve for a 70° day. On its own for today or layered like it is for cooler weather it feels perfect. Loving it! Read more
items.author: Kate

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Sweater! Soft Stylish and so Dreamy
items.body: I am completely in love with this sweater! The light blue color is even more beautiful in person—soft, calming, and flattering on every skin tone. The material is incredibly cozy without being bulky, and it feels like a gentle hug every time I wear it. It’s the perfect blend of comfort and style. I’ve dressed it up with jeans and boots or kept it casual with leggings—either way, it looks amazing. It’s held up great after washing and still looks brand new. I’ve already gotten compliments on it and will definitely be buying more in other colors. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: sheri cupery

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is off. Fits like a bag.
items.body: I wanted to love this sweater but I don't and will be returning. It fits like a bag. I thought the bottom was more fitted based on the pics from the model, but it is loose and baggy. I ordered a small so I can't size down. I'm disappointed because I was so excited to get this sweater. The quality of the sweater is good. The blue color is not as bright as the picture but it is close. I would have loved the sweater if not for the bottom because the rest of it was really good. Read more
items.author: Shopgirl129

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So flattering!!!!
items.body: Love it. At first taking it out of the bag I said oh no I hope this isn't the new sweater.. oh I thought I hate the material and then I unfolded it and I said oh no it's too big. Then I put it on it is absolutely gorgeous. It's so flattering. The material is so expensive feeling and the shape is beyond. As good as the picture. Buy it you will love it! Read more
items.author: Patty

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Brilliant Blue, Blue, Grey Blue, Bright Orange, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Orange, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
